articles.description: Russia are set to be allowed to play at the next World Cup as a 'neutral' team wearing a red kit and carrying the country's name on their shirts - despite being banned.
articles.content:
Russia are set to be allowed to play at the next World Cup as a neutral team wearing a red kit and carrying the countrys name on their shirts despite being banned.

articles.title: Full details as Premier League clubs reject five substitutes but make key change - Mirror Online
articles.description: The likes of Jurgen Klopp and Pep Guardiola have been campaigning for the ability to make five changes per match but this will not be the case
articles.content:
Premier League clubs will soon be allowed to name nine substitutes on the bench - but will still only be permitted to make three changes per match rather than five.
